name: Pet Salon
description: This is a website I designed for a Pet Salon. It offers online appointment booking and showcases the salons services. It is bright and airy and reflects the caring and fun nature of the business.

name: Online Retail Store
description: A simplistic online store design that allows for the ultimate user experience. The minimalistic design offers a features such as real time price for multiple items, a cart function and checkout function. Users can easily see their total and remove unwanted items with ease.

name: Real Estate Website
description: An elegant and minimalistic website that showcases a real estate company's offerings. The site caters to the user by showcasing what each property has to offer without the user needing to click on a property. Additionally, if offers side by side comparison which allows users to easily compare and choose the house that is right for their vacation needs.
